docs.snippet: Claims against debtors in Brazil amounting to approximately $30,000,000 have been filed by American exporters with the National Foreign Trade Council, which has been designated as a clearing house to carry on negotiations to collect on frozen...
docs.lead_paragraph: Claims against debtors in Brazil amounting to approximately $30,000,000 have been filed by American exporters with the National Foreign Trade Council, which has been designated as a clearing house to carry on negotiations to collect on frozen credits, it was announced here yesterday.

headline.main: CLAIMS UPON BRAZIL FILLED WITH COUNCIL; Debt Total of $30,000,000 Is Due Exporters -- Shipments to Italy on Draft Stopped.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 10. -- The value of United States exports to all major geographical divisions of the world increased markedly in November over the corresponding month the year before, the Department of Commerce reported today. Imports also...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 10. -- The value of United States exports to all major geographical divisions of the world increased markedly in November over the corresponding month the year before, the Department of Commerce reported today. Imports also increased, but in lesser degree and, in the case of Southern North America, a decline was noted.

headline.main: NOVEMBER EXPORTS UP 38% FROM 1934; Total Was $269,310,247, With 63% Increase to Europe in the Lead. IMPORT VALUES ROSE 14% $169,385,520 Aggregate in Month Got Major Proportionate Lift, 50%, From Africa.
